name: companion potato
description: Seems like some kind of Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System, attached to a potato.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Hello?

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: When the testing is over, you will be missed.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Unbelievable. You, [subject name here], must be the pride of [subject hometown here]!

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: That thing is probably some sort of raw sewage container. Go ahead and rub your face all over it.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Oh well. If you want my advice, you should just lie down in front of a rocket.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: You're not even going the right way.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: It was a fun test and we're all impressed at how much you won. The test is over. Come back.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Is anyone there?

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: You're not a good person. You know that, right?

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: This is your fault. It didn't have to be like this.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: I'd just like to point out that you were given every opportunity to succeed.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Have fun soaring through the air without a care in the world.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Did you know that people with guilty consciences are more easily startled by loud noise--[train horn]--

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: [fast gibberish]

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Initiating surprise in three... two... one.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Woah! Where are we? How long have I been out?

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: No tricks. This potato only generates 1.1 volts of electricity. I literally do not have the energy to lie to you.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Agh! Bird! Bird! Kill it! It's evil!

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: The good news is... well, none so far, to be honest. I'll get back to you on that.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: I know we're in a lot of trouble and probably about to die.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: [Whispered] For the record: You ARE adopted, and that's TERRIBLE.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: I don't know what you think you are doing, but I don't like it. I want you to stop.

speaker: aperture_potato
sound: Oh. Sorry. I was just thinking of all the ways humans can die.
